DOC.brief_summary: PF-04958242 in single doses will be safe and well tolerated by healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: First-In-Human Study Of PF-04958242 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: To test the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of PF-04958242 in healthy volunteers.
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers, male and female, ages 2155 No women of childbearing potential, no risk factors for seizures, no risk factors for QTc prolongation
